instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no image. has backlight
threads.message:
This was a known good board for testing. i needed some readings and made an accident.

My hand accidentally slip and shorted <CAPACITOR>C9796</CAPACITOR>'s 30v to L9080's pin 2.
now the <SIGNAL>LVDS_CONN_A_CLK_F_P</SIGNAL> line is fuked.
this line talk to the PCH.

diode mode on L9080's pin 2 is 0.227
diode mode on L9080's pin 3 is 0.552

i've changed L9080 and didnt help :)

laptop turn on with backlight but no image
i dont have a BGA machine. so this board can turn into mac mini or is there another way to fix it?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no image. has backlight
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no image. has backlight
threads.message: Yeah dead PCH. Also need to fix the BIOS with a clean ME region after replacing the PCH.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no image. has backlight
threads.message: duke, let me send it to you to replace the pch, will pay you of course :P, otherwise watch out on uk ebay.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> - no image. has backlight
threads.message: If you want to send it to NL then fine. I'm also in B'ham in 10 days, so you can send it to the UK and I can bring it back to NL. Contact in PM if interested.
